price: Na hawa hawangojei ila ukelele mmoja tu usio na muda.
arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٖ
footnotes: Na hao walio jiunga kuwapinga Mitume hawangojei ila ukelele mmoja usio hitajia kukaririwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā yanẓuru hāulāi illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan mā lahā min fawāqin
